FuncDef: This command configures destination IPv6 address LI filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies any IPv6 address entered as:. Values-x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x   (eight 16-bit pieces).
Specifies the prefix length. Values-1 to 128.
Specifies any IPv6 address mask expressed as:. Values-x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x   (eight 16-bit pieces).
